rooms.description: Spacious foyer with natural lighting from floor-to-ceiling windows, adhering to Vastu by aligning entrance in the north-east direction.
Eco-friendly space with floor-to-ceiling glass walls for ample daylight. Features energy-efficient fixtures and natural ventilation, oriented east to harness morning sunlight.
Adjacent to the kitchen, designed with sustainable materials. Incorporates Vastu principles by positioning dining space in the south-east quadrant for balanced energy flow.
Spacious master suite featuring a private balcony with floor-to-ceiling windows. Utilizes eco-friendly insulation and natural ventilation, placed in the north direction as per Vastu.
Smaller bedroom designed for energy efficiency, with ample natural light from glass windows. Placed in the east quadrant to promote balance.
Additional bedroom maintaining eco-friendly features and Vastu compliant orientation in the north-west area.
Compact yet efficient kitchen space using sustainable materials. Ventilation designed to align with Vastu principles by avoiding heavy placements near the west wall.
Small, functional living area for staff, built with cost-effective and sustainable methods. Positioned away from main living areas while ensuring access to natural light.

openings.description: Large glass openings that enhance natural lighting and ventilation, reducing energy consumption.
Vastu aligned entrance with integrated security features and eco-friendly materials.
Access to an outdoor swimming pool designed for recreational use, integrating water elements in line with Vastu principles.
